has.from sentence: Wiki QA : For the WikiQA dataset , the pointwise learning approach shows a better performance than the listwise learning approach .

combine.from sentence: We combine LM with the base model ( Comp - Clip + LM ) and observe a significant improvement in performance in terms of MAP ( 0.714 to 0.746 absolute ) .

LC method ( Comp - Clip + LM + LC ).from sentence: When we add the LC method ( Comp - Clip + LM + LC ) , the best previous results are surpassed in terms of MAP ( 0.718 to 0.764 absolute ) .

pointwise learning approach.from sentence: The pointwise learning approach also shows excellent performance with the TREC - QA dataset .

best previous result.add: LC method , ( Comp - Clip + LM + LC )

our model.from sentence: In particular , our model outperforms the best previous result when we add LC method , ( Comp - Clip + LM + LC ) in terms of MAP ( 0.865 to 0.868 ) .

additional performance gains.from sentence: As in the WikiQA case , we achieve additional performance gains in terms of the MAP as we apply LM , LC , and TL ( 0.850 , 0.868 and 0.875 , respectively ) .
